column5: Well we made the choice to add to our family and we have this little girl coming to us Dec 20th. She is a mini Golden doodle (red coat) We also have a 5 year Golden Retriever (autumn) who will love the little pup and help train her to be as good a dog as she is.  (hopefully) We have decided on the name Whiskey. My 11 year old son and I can't wait to get our new fishing buddy out on the water with us! Cheers!
Awesome! Be prepared for ridiculous amounts of energy all the time lol my brother has one and she's a year and a half and just crazy all the time haha
Thanks Leaf4.  We run and swim the heck out of our dogs so high energy is no issue for us.  My golden is 5 and acts like a puppy still around water or a ball. Cheers!
Congrats man that is one CUTE pup!
Cute pup.  Make sure to take a lot of pictures, they grow up so fast.
I am glad you have room in your heart for the furry folks in the world. I have had a dog since I was born and I can't even think of life without them.  Art
